document_data.caption: Alisannara Morcane, High Priestess of Szith Morcane
document_data.name: Alisannara Morcane
document_data.History: She was consumed by a ''[[destruction]]'' spell when followers of [[Kiaransalee]] from [[Maerimydra]] overthrew [[House Morcane]]. Afterward, Alisannara remained in the [[Fane of Lolth]] above House Morcane as a [[keening spirit]] attacking any who entered its inner fane.
document_data.Description: Alisannara was a stern drow [[cleric]] of slight proportions, dressed in a black robe trimmed with purple and burgundy. In death, she looked much the same although she manifested as a hazy and insubstantial version of her living self.
